posts.post_content:
Hey guys, I have four of the ten T210 Chattanooga cards and am trying to slowly chip away at the remaining six. If anyone has any of the following available and are willing to sell, that would be amazing!

[STRIKE]Carson[/STRIKE]
Collins
[STRIKE]Demaree[/STRIKE]
Dobbs
McLaurin
Miller
[STRIKE]Patterson[/STRIKE]
Rhodes
Schlitzer
[STRIKE]Yerkes[/STRIKE]

Especially on the hunt for Rhodes and Dobbs.

Thanks

Excellent list! I am working on the Montgomery guys and have slowly whittled it down to the last three or four. A member here helped me with one a few months ago and I was thrilled to add it, hopefully someone can help you out too! 

I look forward to hearing how it progresses for you, the t210's have always been a fave of mine.
Thanks, Shane! Chattanooga is my hometown, so this set is extra special to me! It’s taken me a few years just to track down the four I have, so I expect this to be a lifelong project :D
